TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings in ORG ( NORP міський суд ORG області ) against his former employer , the ORG PERSON “ PERSON ” ( “ the Company ” ; ДВАТ « GPE гірничо-монтажне управління GPE ) for various payments .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the court awarded the applicant a total of CARDINAL NORP hryvnyas ( ORG ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби Червоноградського міського управління юстиції GPE області ) initiated the enforcement proceedings for collecting the above amount .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received ORG DATE .
CARDINAL . The remaining judgments debt is outstanding on account of the ORG 's lack of funds and the holding of its assets in tax lien .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
